summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 6%) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), light levels (up 3410 lux), cloud levels (up 470 m), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1404 m), light levels (up 5747 lux), and rainfall (down 0.2 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 470.5m lower than yesterday, 996.2m lower than past week, 1403.5m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1402.8m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels. Possible light showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
